original_text: I will spread my net for him, and he will be caught in my snare. I will bring him to Babylon and execute judgment on him there because he was unfaithful to me.
korean_text: 그 위에 내 그물을 치며 내 올무에 걸리게 하여 끌고 바벨론으로 가서 나를 반역한 그 반역을 거기에서 심판할지며

sentences.original_text: I will spread my net for him
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그를 위해 내 그물을 펼치겠다

sentences.original_text: and he will be caught in my snare
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 내 덫에 걸릴 것이다

sentences.original_text: I will bring him to Babylon
and execute judgment on him there
because he was unfaithful to me
